meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leonard Cooper Barrett Block Nilai Sarda Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6541.

div.div:
2013 Teen Tournament final game 1.
Leonard Cooper becomes the first tournament finalist by rule after the second semifinal game ended without a winner.

td.p: Leonard Cooper, a senior from Little Rock, Arkansas
Barrett Block, a senior from Lexington, Kentucky
Nilai Sarda, a freshman from Marietta, Georgia

tr.td: COLLEGE RECOMMENDATIONS
WORLD CAPITALS
CELEBRITIES
MEDIEVAL TIMES
ONOMATOPOEIA
SNEAKER-ING AROUND

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Don\'t walk on the brass "M" on the diag before your first test at this Ann Arbor school; legend says you\'ll flunk it if you do')
